QuestData.Title: Clefthoof Training: Great-Tusk
QuestData.Description: The first step in training your mount for war will be getting it used to the sights and sounds of combat. If it's not trained properly, it might get spooked and run.$B$BTake this little clefthoof out to the plains of Shadowmoon Valley and take on the biggest beast you can find, together. That should raise its confidence!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Great-Tusk while riding your Clefthoof -In-Training.
